items.title: Uncut: Behind The Scenes of Bellator 145 in St. Louis
items.description: Take an all-access look at Bellator 145: Pitbull vs. Straus and go behind the scenes of a night that brought two title fights to the Scottrade Center in St. Louis , MO. See what happens backstage as champions Patricio Pitbull and Will Brooks prepare for title defenses against challengers Daniel Straus and Marcin Held. Additionally, take a peek into the locker rooms of Bobby Lashley, James Thompson, Michael Chandler, David Rickels, Justin Lawrence, and Emmanuel Sanchez as they prepare for battle.If that wasnâ€™t enough, see what happens when one of the biggest announcements of 2015 in the sport of MMA is made.

items.title: A New Champion - The Bellator 145 Moment
items.description: A near finish. A close comeback. A near repeat of a previous encounter, but ultimately, a new champion is crowned.

items.title: Daniel Straus vs. Patricio Pitbull III
items.description: Can Daniel Straus finally beat Patricio Pitbull, and secure the Bellator Featherweight championship?

items.title: Marcin Held vs. Will Brooks
items.description: Leglock specialist Marcin Held gets his crack at the Lightweight Championship. It's time to get ill.

items.title: David Rickels vs. Michael Chandler II
items.description: Lightweights David "Caveman" Rickels and "Iron" Michael Chandler meet in a rematch of their clash from Bellator 93.

items.title: Bellator MMA: Road to Vengeance Part 2
items.description: In part 2 of Road to Vengeance, we see Michael Chandler training in Phoenix. And Daniel Straus disects his second fight with the Champion Patricio "Pitbull".
